full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): #, ,DBYANGS CAN MDO'I 'GREL BA DBYANGS CAN DGONGS PA RAB GSAL ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @020B DBYANGS CAN MDO'I MTSAMS SBYOR LNGA PA'I 'GREL BA DBYANGS CAN DGONGS PAR BA GSAL ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, ,KHU RE CHEN PO'I WANG GAS KHAMS TSAN GYI DGE BSHES BLO BZANG TSE DPAG DANG, BEE DZA YA KHAMS TSAN GYI BLO GSAR SKAL LDAN YON TAN RGYA MTSO GNYIS KYIS, TAB DKAR LHA RDZAS DANG DRIL BU'I 'OG GZHI DANG, DNGUL GYI KONG BU DANG KAR GOS RNAMS DANG BCAS PA PHUL NAS NAN CHER BSKUL BA'I NGOR, DKA' BCU BLO BZANG BKRA SHIS KYIS BRIS PA'O,, ,,
